import React from 'react'; import axios from 'axios'; import { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import {FontAwesomeIcon} from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import './metismenu.min.css'; import { faArrowLeft, faArrowRight, faBars, faCalendar, faComment, faCommentDots, faSearch, faTag } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' import { faFacebookF, faInstagram, faPinterest, faTwitter } from '@fortawesome/free-brands-svg-icons'; import {faArrowAltCircleRight} from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons'; import './blog.css'; import Navbar from './nav'; import Footer from './footer'; import image1 from './assets/img/fall.png'; import image2 from './assets/img/download.png'; import image3 from './assets/img/blog1.jpg'; const api = axios.create({ baseURL : "http://localhost:5000/" }); var x=0 ; var y=0,z=0; var avg=0; const Blog = () => { const [name,setName] = useState(''); const [comment,setComment] = useState(''); const [rating,setRating] = useState(''); const [list,setList] = useState([]); const fetchData = async ()=>{ try{ const response = await api.get("/"); console.log(response.data.data.list); setList(response.data.data.list); }catch(err){} }; const handleSubmit = async (e)=>{ e.preventDefault(); try{ console.log(name); console.log(comment); console.log(rating); const response = await api.post("/create", { name,comment,rating } ); console.log('hello'); console.log(response); setName(""); setComment(""); setRating(""); fetchData(); }catch(err){} }; useEffect(() => { fetchData(); }, []) return ( {/**/}
